mapper.select: select eventNum, eventName, eventContent, eventThumbnail, startDate, endDate from event order by eventNum DESC

select * from (select noticeNum, noticeType, subject, to_char(regdate, 'MM.DD') regdate from noticeBoard order by noticeNum DESC)
where ROWNUM<=7

select * from (select reviewNum, reviewType, subject, to_char(regdate, 'MM.DD') regdate from reviewBoard order by reviewNum DESC)
where ROWNUM<=7
